LIGHTS OUT!

A Simple Browser Game where the goal is to make the lights go out.

Moves: 0
Time: 0:00
Hints: 0

How to Play:

Click one of the tiles to toggle it and its direct neighbors' power state. Your goal is to to turn all tiles off.

You won!

Great job.
